name: TacticsToolkit
description:
Tactics Toolkit is the all-in-one template for SRPG games. Split into seven different scenes, this asset pack with show you all the parts that make up an SRPG level. 

  1. Pathfinding
  2. RPG Systems
  3. Effect Tiles
  4. Turn-Based Mechanics
  5. Basic Attacks
  6. Abilities
  7. Enemy AI

And there is a final scene that uses all of these systems. 

This will be an asset pack on the unity asset store. Currently going through the review process, but I'll add the link here once it's done.
